name: docsy-starter

scripts._check:links--warn: npm run _check:links || (echo; echo 'WARNING: see link-checker output for issues.'; echo)
scripts._commit:public: HASH=$(git rev-parse --short main); cd public && git add -A && git commit -m "Site at $HASH"
scripts._filename-error: echo 'ERROR: the following files violate naming conventions; fix using: `npm run fix:filenames`'; echo; npm run -s _ls-bad-filenames; exit 1
scripts._preupdate:docsy: echo 'INFO: forcing a full clean install of Docsy'; rm -f package-lock.json
scripts.check:format: npm run _check:format || (echo '[help] Run: npm run fix:format'; exit 1)
scripts.diff:check: npm run _diff:check || (echo; echo 'WARNING: the files above have not been committed'; echo)
scripts.preupdate:docsy: npm run _preupdate:docsy && echo 'INFO: set DOCSY_VERSION to desired Docsy version'
scripts.seq: bash -c 'for cmd in "$@"; do npm run $cmd || exit 1; done' -
scripts.test: npm list docsy && npm run check:format && npm run check:links
scripts.update:docsy:local: npm run preupdate:docsy && npm install -D file:../docsy/docsy && npm list docsy
scripts.update:docsy:main: npm run preupdate:docsy && npm install -D google/docsy#main && npm list docsy
scripts.update:docsy: DOCSY_VERSION=${DOCSY_VERSION:-0.14.0} npm install -D google/docsy#semver:$DOCSY_VERSION && npm list docsy

enginesComment: Ensure that engines.node value stays consistent with the project's .nvmrc
gitHubActionCacheKey: 2026-02-09 - refresh cache for Docsy and latest hugo-extended
spelling: cSpell:ignore docsy hugo HTMLTEST netlify precheck postbuild preupdate -
